name: Minoan Mob
description:
This is my game for the 8x8 pixel game jam. It is a tower defense game where you play as Daedalus and try to stop a revolution on Crete. There are still quite a few big glitches. I'm not happy with the amount of glitches that persist. 

Some notable glitches:

YOU CAN'T WIN!? WHY CAN'T YOU WIN? THIS NEVER CAME UP DURING TESTING?!

The SFX volume setter suddenly just doesn't work for some reason.

When you upgrade a tower and you've got more than one tower on the board, the UI will sometimes go haywire.

The pathfinding is really bad.

The save game doesn't work.

And probably many more.
